steps.name: Check image security with Dockle

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Check image security with Dockle
steps.run:
VERSION=$(
curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/goodwithtech/dockle/releases/latest" | \
grep '"tag_name":' | \
sed -E 's/.*"v([^"]+)".*/\1/' \
) && docker run --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  goodwithtech/dockle:v${VERSION} nvuillam/mega-linter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:${{ github.event.release.tag_name }} || \
  docker run --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  goodwithtech/dockle:v${VERSION} nvuillam/mega-linter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:${{ github.event.release.tag_name }}

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Check image security with Dockle
steps.run:
VERSION=$(
curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/goodwithtech/dockle/releases/latest" | \
grep '"tag_name":' | \
sed -E 's/.*"v([^"]+)".*/\1/' \
) && docker run --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  goodwithtech/dockle:v${VERSION} nvuillam/mega-linter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:${{ github.event.release.tag_name }} || { sleep 60 && \
  docker run --rm -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock \
  goodwithtech/dockle:v${VERSION} nvuillam/mega-linter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:${{ github.event.release.tag_name }} ; }

steps.name: Free Disk space
steps.run:
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/lib/android  # will release about 10 GB if you don't need Android
sudo rm -rf /usr/share/dotnet # will release about 20GB if you don't need .NET

steps.name: Pull image from GHCR
steps.run: docker system prune -a --force && docker pull ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:v8

steps.name: Tag image for Docker Hub
steps.run: docker tag ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:v8 docker.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:v8

steps.name: Push image to Docker Hub v8
Tag image for Docker Hub
steps.run: docker tag ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:v8 docker.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:${{ github.event.release.tag_name }}

steps.name: Push image to Docker Hub ${{ github.event.release.tag_name }}
Tag image for Docker Hub
steps.run: docker tag ghcr.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:v8 docker.io/oxsecurity/megalinter-${{ matrix.flavor }}:latest

steps.name: Push image to Docker Hub latest
